name: Be a "Saigonese" in a day!
description:
You definitely have heard of Sai Gon but I guess you have not ever had a chance to actually be a real-saigonese. 

-Have you ever tasted typical cuisines from all 3 regions (north to south of Vietnam)?
-Have you ever enjoyed the most popular trend of drinking coffee of the Vietnamese youth?
-Have you ever played a role as a spy using gun in group of more than 10 people?
-Have you ever enjoyed the night eating/drinking/buying souvenirs of foreign culture in miniature right in Saigon?

Let me offer you that chance!
